ActNational Defence Act
Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE GUY RICHARD, of Bouctouche, New Brunswick, as the person nominated by the members who are nominated under subparagraphs 204.23(2)(a) and (b), to be the Chairperson of the Military Judges Compensation Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending August 31, 2011.
